name: ColumbiaRiverFishCounts
0:
”Alexa launch fish counts”
”get counts for Bonneville Dam”
”get counts for Willamette Falls”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fish counts
des:
This skill provides yesterday's fish counts over Columbia River Dams and Willamette falls in the Pacific Northwest.

To ask for the skill, ask Alexa:
"Alexa,launch fish counts"
"get fish counts for <location>".

For example, to get yesterday's fish numbers over Bonneville Dam, just ask:
"Alexa,launch fish counts" 
"get counts for Bonneville Dam"

You can also get a list of locations by asking:
"list locations"
